replies.author: 索菲缇娅
replies.txt_content:
The problem is that you're playing the new version. It's FULL and I mean FULL? of glitches. Or you need better ram. 
翻译：AoA3换成稳定版或者调整内存
第一次创建世界进游戏没问题，退出再进就会崩
